```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
acs_vars <- load_variables(2019, "acs5")
```

```{r}
moved <- get_acs(geography = "tract", state = "Massachusetts",  
                         variables = c(same_county = "B07001_033", diff_state = "B07001_065", 
                                       same_state = "B07001_049", abroad = "B07001_081"), output = 
                          "wide", quiet = TRUE)
```

```{r}

moved$tot_moved <- moved$same_countyE + moved$same_stateE + moved$diff_stateE + moved$abroadE
  
```
